name: Stop and Go
description:
Stop and Go, inspired by Netflix's Squid Game Minigames Red Light Green Light!

Hey everyone! Liyeon here. I just recently started learning Game Development a month ago and this is my first game that I want to publish to everyone! This game is inspired by one of Squid Game's minigames in the show. There are some bugs that needed to be fix but all is well to play :)

Hope you guys enjoy!
